name: Cross Racing Championship Extreme 2005
summary:
Cross Racing Championship Extreme 2005 (or CRC 2005) is a Motorsport game developed by Invictus Games, where the player begins his/her career as an amateur Autocross racer and races through 65 various racing events for ultimately becoming the "Cross Racing Champion". These 65 races includes: Autocross, Rallycross, Off-Road, Rally-Sprint, Rally, Road Racing and finally the championship ends in tough Circuit Racing. The prize is a Classic T8 super-car, which can get up to speeds of 280 km/h when the car is in stage 3.[2] 
 
Tracks England[UK] France[Serpentin] America[Beach] Germany[track] Hungary[Mud track] Finland[Snow]
